intro.description: This cheat sheet shows you how to configure Eclipse for the Swordfish Target platform and how to create a plug-in project for JAX-WS services.

item.title: Configuring Eclipse for the Swordfish Target Platform
item.description:
1. Click Windows > Preferences > Plug-in development > Target Platform. Click Add.
2. In the New Target Definition window, select the Template check box and select Swordfish. Click Next.
3. Create a new target definition and click Finish.
4. In the New Target Definition window, select the Swordfish check box. Click Apply.
5. Click OK to confirm your actions.

item.title: Creating a Configuration to Launch the Swordfish Target Platform
item.description:
1. Click Run > Run Configurations....
2. Right-click OSGi Framework and select New. Type Swordfish as the name for the configuration.
3. Click Apply.
4. Click Close.
